New Records: LaMelo Ball made two free throws to give Charlotte the lead for good
Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo's jumper at the buzzer rimmed out
Ron Holland II missed two free throws after a phantom call
Pre-Game Insights: The Bucks argued about late-game officiating this past Wednesday as well
Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers said after that game: "I thought the final play was the ref blowing a call."
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks coach Doc Rivers was fined $25,000
LaMelo Ball was fined $100,000 on Sunday for using an anti-gay slur
Others: The Charlotte Hornets escaped with the win
The Bucks prevailed 127-120 behind 59 points from Giannis Antetokounmpo
